attributes.action: Publically State That Gordon Brown Should Not Be The Next PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am looking for Tony Blair to once and for all agree with the growing number of Citizens in there comdenation of Gordon Brown and the work he has done to make the worse place to live over the last 10yrs.

Gordon has succesfully mismanaged nearer enough every part of the economy leading to numerous problems with pensions, industries and lowering of the standard of living within the UK.
